by.zti.main.serializer

Class Serializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.zti.main.serializer.Serializer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Class type for instance to work with.

    public class Serializer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class works from an instance and allows you to easily serialize and deserialize objects from your program.
    Since:
    ZTIU 1.0.2

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Serializer()
      Empty constructor for creating empty instance
      Serializer(java.io.File file)
      Constructor that creates an instance of Serializer class and associates it with given File.
      Serializer(java.lang.String path)
      Constructor that creates an instance of Serializer class and associates it with file by given path.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T deserialize()
      This method should be called to deserialize object from stored File location.

      void serialize(T obj)
      This method should be called to serialize object to stored File location.

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        public void serialize(T obj)
        This method should be called to serialize object to stored File location.
        Parameters:
        obj - Object to be serialized.

      • deserialize

        public T deserialize()
        This method should be called to deserialize object from stored File location.
        Returns:
        Object deserialized from stored File location.

      • getFile

        public java.io.File getFile()
        Returns:
        returns stored File instance.

      • setFile

        Parameters:
